data_descriptor.name: interacting_in_person
data_descriptor.description: Participant was interacting with other people in person. 1=Yes, 0=No

data_descriptor.name: interacting_electronically
data_descriptor.description: Participant was electronically interacting with other people. 1=Yes, 0=No

input_parameters.window_size: 10 minutes prior starting qualtrics context survey

algorithm.description: This algorithm analyze 10 minutes (prior to participant starts filling context survey) to label window whether participant was interacting or not.
